name: AfterWar
description:
Welcome to the AfterWar page!

The beginning of the game time is July 2024, where you meet the map of Ukraine and the part of Europe that the author thinks it will be after the victory of Ukraine in the Russo-Ukrainian War

In AfterWar, you can bring about 20 leaders to power in the country. The game also has a money system, where investing in a region will earn you more money in the next year. For regional money, you can reduce corruption and increase the stability of the country. If your stability is low and corruption is high, you will be accompanied by random events and lower or less likely to increase your stats

During the game, you can change the speed of the game time. An instrumental-folk version of the national anthem of Ukraine sounds in the background, which adds atmosphere to the game
